name: Publish-iT Document
summary: Learn about .DTP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DTP files can also be exported by Publish-iT as .PDF documents.

description: Page layout file created with Publish-iT desktop publishing (DTP) software; may include text, images, special page formatting, and multiple pages; often used for creating newsletters, brochures, or other types of printable documents.
